112  // See: https://www.khronos.org/registry/OpenGL-Refpages/gl4/html/glBufferStorage.xhtml
113  enum class BufferStorageFlag {
114  kReadable = GL_MAP_READ_BIT, // Data store may be mapped by client for read access
115  kWriteable = GL_MAP_WRITE_BIT, // Data store may be mapped by client for write access
116  kPersistent = GL_MAP_PERSISTENT_BIT, // Requires read or write. Client may request that the server read/write from the buffer while it is mapped
117  kCoherent = GL_MAP_COHERENT_BIT, // Requires kPersistent. Shared access to buffers that are simultaneously mapped for client access will be coherent as long as mapping is performed using glMapBufferRange, i.e., data written to the store by either the client or server will be immediately visible to the other
118  kDynamicStorage = GL_DYNAMIC_STORAGE_BIT, // Contents may be update through calls to glBufferSubData
119  kClientStorage = GL_CLIENT_STORAGE_BIT // Determine whether to use storage that is local to the server or client to serve as backing store for buffer
120  };

213  template<typename T>
214  void copyData(std::vector<T>& outData, size_t len, size_t startIndex = 0, bool unmap = true) {
215  T* bufferData = data<T>(GL::RangeBufferAccessFlag::kRead);
216  outData = std::vector<T>(bufferData + startIndex, bufferData + len + startIndex);

230  inline void subData(const T* val, size_t offset, size_t size = 1) {

232  }
233  inline void subData(const void* val, size_t offsetBytes, size_t sizeBytes) {
234  bool wasBound = isBound();
235  if (!wasBound) {
236  bind();
237  }
238 
239  glBufferSubData((int)m_bufferType,
240  offsetBytes,
241  sizeBytes,
242  val);
243 
244  if (!wasBound) {
245  release();
246  }
247

249  bool error = printGLError("Error on glBufferSubData");
250  if (error) {
251  Logger::Throw("Error on glBufferSubData");
252  }
253 #endif
254  }
